articles.title: Rivalry aside, North Carolina Gov. Roy Cooper, a UNC grad, honors Duke's Mike Krzyzewski
articles.description: Setting aside the heated college basketball rivalry, recently retired Duke University coach Mike Krzyzewski was honored Thursday by Gov. Roy Cooper - a two-time graduate of the University of North Carolina - with the state's highest honor.

articles.title: Washington Commanders Brian Robinson on NFI list so he won't try to rush back, coach Ron Rivera says
articles.description: The Commanders placed Brian Robinson on the non-football injury list Thursday, meaning he will miss at least four games. Ron Rivera said the move was made so he will focus on his recovery and not try to rush back.
articles.content:

articles.title: Hilary Knight sets worlds scoring record as United States advances to semifinals
articles.description: USA Hockey star Hilary Knight has set the career scoring record at the world championships after posting a goal and an assist in a 12-1 quarterfinal victory over Hungary.
articles.content:
USA Hockey star Hilary Knight set the IIHF women's world championships career scoring record in the Americans' 12-1 win over Hungary on Thursday in Herning, Denmark.
